SEARCH
Package org.nse.thesis.wordindex.jni

Class JNIWordIndexBindings

java.lang.Object
org.nse.thesis.wordindex.jni.JNIWordIndexBindings
public class JNIWordIndexBindings extends Object
Java Bindings to native library's functions.

Call load(String) before accessing any of the native library methods.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load(String libPath)
      Loads the native library.
      Parameters:
      libPath - Path to native shared library.

    • wordIndexOpen

      public static long wordIndexOpen(String filepath, int analyzer, long capacity, long bufferSize, boolean compact)
      Creates a native word index for specified file. Remember to close it!
      Parameters:
      filepath - Path to text file to be indexed.
      analyzer - Analyzer used in tokenizing words from text.
      capacity - Estimate how many unique words file might contain.
      bufferSize - Suggested size of buffer that's used when indexing the file.
      compact - Should index be compacted after indexing is done.
      Returns:
      Handle to native WordIndex

    • wordIndexClose

      public static void wordIndexClose(long handle)
      Closes native WordIndex, releasing all native resources.
      Parameters:
      handle - Handle to native WordIndex

    • wordIndexReadWithContextBuffered

      public static long wordIndexReadWithContextBuffered(long handle, ByteBuffer readBuffer, long readBufferSize, String word, int wordLen, int context, long wordIterator)

      Reads words with context from indexed file in buffered manner. If buffer was not big enough to read all results, iterator handle is returned. Next call to this method should use that iterator as a parameter to continue where previous call left.

      Buffer byte protocol

      Strings are written to read buffer as contiguous span of bytes, lead by 4 byte integer, specifying string byte length. TERM_BUFFER_MARK == no more strings left in the buffer.

      Example: 

           [3ace2of5spades..]
      Parameters:
      handle - Native WordIndex handle
      readBuffer - Native buffer to read result into
      readBufferSize - Native buffer size
      word - To search for
      wordLen - Length of the word in bytes
      context - Context surrounding the word in indexed file
      wordIterator - Word file position iterator. Initially should be NULL (0), after that, it should be the return value of this method.
      Returns:
      Word file position iterator.

    • wordIndexCloseIterator

      public static void wordIndexCloseIterator(long iterator)
      Closes native iterator, releasing its resources. Not closing it will cause a memory leak, IF the iterator was not exhausted. So if you give up on reading, when there's still results remaining, call this method!
      Parameters:
      iterator - WordIndex word file position iterator.
